entry.title: Running Shoe Cube in Clubhouse Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 65.00

The Running Shoe Cube is a low-profile hero that keeps sneakers separate, odors contained, and routines a little more organized.

Made from lightweight, machine-washable ripstop nylon, it's structured and breathable, with a wipeable, antimicrobial lining. The full zip-around opening lays flat for easy packing, and the top grab handle means you can toss it into your Sport Backpack or Gym Bag (or your suitcase) without a hitch. Think of it as your gear's best-kept secret.

entry.title: Dry Bag Duo in Seaside Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 65.00

For the days that blur together in sunscreen, salt water, and shifting plans—there's the Dry Bag Duo. This set of two water-resistant bags keeps the clean nice and dry, the sand well-contained, and all your other essentials sealed and sorted.

Made from durable ripstop, they're splash-resistant, sun-ready, and built to keep up—whether you're packing up after a swim or the gym, hopping on a boat, or tossing damp clothes into the car before dinner. The roll-top closure locks everything in with a few quick folds, while two sizes make it easy to pack with purpose. These dry bags keep the beach in check—so you can stay in vacation mode.

entry.title: Travel Glasses Case in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 75.00

Bring the shades, bring the backups—maybe even one just for the beach reads under an umbrella. The Travel Glasses Case is mini but mighty, with space for up to three pairs and a padded microsuede lining to keep them scratch-free, smudge-free, and easy to grab.

Toss it in your beach tote during the day, then carry it to the alfresco dinner as a clutch for golden hour (yes, it does both). Whether you're juggling readers and sunnies or just making room for that inevitable impulse buy, this case is one of those small luxuries that makes the whole day feel more pulled together.

entry.title: Kids Packing Cubes in Fruit Punch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 40.00

Teach them to travel smart from the start with our Kids Packing Cubes—a game changer for even the smallest adventurers (and the parents who pack them). Designed to maximize space and minimize your repacking efforts, the cute, color-blocked set includes three cubes that work with our Kids Carry-On compression system and keep everything from tiny socks to “essential” souvenirs in their place. Beyond their huge organizational lift, these cubes make packing feel like play for them—and turn chaos into calm for you.

entry.title: The Train Case in Salt White (Gloss)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 165.00

The iconic '90s organizer gets an upgrade—meet The Train Case. With a sleek, structured silhouette and durable polycarbonate hardshell, this versatile organizer is perfect for cosmetics, hair tools, tech accessories, camera gear, and so much more.

Stay secure and organized with an interior zipper pocket and adjustable dividers that can create four to six compartments within the case. Choose how you carry it—via the shoulder strap, easy-grip top handle, or trolley sleeve that secures to any Away suitcase. Plus, with hundreds of personalization options, it's as customizable as it is stylish.

entry.title: The Shoe Cube in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 25.00 - 35.00 (2 variants)

Made from sturdy and flexible water repellent nylon, our Shoe Cubes feature a collapsible divider to store and separate multiple pairs of shoes, and a handle for easy carrying or hanging.

entry.title: The Centerfold Garment Sleeve in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 65.00 - 85.00 (2 variants)

Our Centerfold Garment Sleeve, designed to fit perfectly inside carry-on suitcases, zips open vertically, keeping everything inside secure and wrinkle-free. Made with water-resistant nylon and featuring classic leather details, this bag clips into your luggage, leaving your clothes folded and pressed throughout any journey.

entry.title: The Insider Packing Cubes in Coast Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 45.00

Our packing cubes compress and organize everything inside your suitcase, from socks to shirts to even your bulkiest items. Made from water repellent nylon that protects your clothes, these travel must-haves are designed with a mesh panel to make it easy to find what you need without fully unpacking. Thoughtfully packaged as a set of four, our packing cubes are designed to fit perfectly inside our luggage.

entry.title: The Large Tech Case in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 75.00

Take what you need to work (or play) remotely in The Large Tech Case. This tech organizer will keep your gadgets—including your laptop charger, hard drives, and small gaming or music accessories—safe and secure. With a separate zipper compartment for larger devices and elastic loops for tangle-free cable storage, each and every item has a dedicated space. Plus, with an exterior handle on top, you can easily carry this case from one stop to the next (and every charging station along the way).

entry.title: Hanging Jewelry Organizer in Sea Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 95.00

Introducing the Hanging Jewelry Organizer—the perfect travel companion for keeping your jewelry secure and tangle-free wherever you go. Thoughtfully designed with recycled leather and polyester, and polished metal hardware for a modern touch.

Every piece has a dedicated spot, from necklaces and bracelets to earrings and rings. The center compartment keeps necklaces from tangling, while a clear, divided pocket holds medium-sized pieces like cuffs and hoops. Two padded holders and a flat earring panel keep even your tiniest accessories in place. With a hook for easy hanging and a soft microfiber lining to protect your jewelry, this organizer simplifies on-the-go accessorizing. Compact enough to slip into any suitcase or bag—it's the perfect addition to your travel routine (or gift list). Gift a getaway essential they can't travel without.
